Vehicle.Name: Nyalsan II Planetary Shield Generator
Vehicle.Description: [H3]Nyalsan II Planetary Shield Generator[h3] Please see page 47 of the Lead by Example Sourcebook for details. [P][I]Disclaimer: This is a piece of field equipment found in the Lead by Example Sourcebook. It is created as a stationary "vehicle" because it is the most appropriate format. While any mods or benefits are per the official source, the actual vehicle stats are an interpretation only and are not official. Feel free to modify them if you think any changes are required.[i]

Mod.MiscDesc: Provides Ranged Defense of 2 to each quadrant (north, south, east, and west) of a base and can be reassigned similar to the Angle Deflector Shield maneuver.
